org.eclipse.cdt.internal.ui.compare.CParseTreeBuilder$ParseError

Alain, why does the comparator throw a ParseError on acceptProblem().  
Are you trying to stop the parse?

Fix in the head.

Comparator does not really care about syntax problems,
meaning the diff tree is a best effort not vital.

Do nothing, when syntax errors.
